Event: The individual is feeling stressed and unhappy with their current life as a human, wishing they could be born into another species where they could live a simpler and less stressful life.

In this post, the individual is attributing their current stress and unhappiness to being human, and they are wishing they could be born into another species where life is simpler and less complicated. This is an example of an internal attributional style because the individual is attributing their negative emotions to their own inherent qualities (in this case, being human) rather than to external circumstances or events.
